meanings.sent1: The rose in the garden is bloomier than the one in the vase.
meanings.sent2: Her artwork became even bloomier after she added more colors.
meanings.sent3: The sky looked bloomier than a field of flowers after the rain.
meanings.sent4: The music filled the room with a bloomier atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The garden in spring is always bloomier than in winter.

meanings.sent1: Among all the flowers, the rose is the bloomiest.
meanings.sent2: Her garden is the bloomiest on the whole street.
meanings.sent3: The cake was decorated to look the bloomiest of all.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky in the bloomiest hues.
meanings.sent5: The bloomiest season for flowers is usually spring.
